A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just saw TLJ and thank you Disney for turning the Star Wars franchise into \"The Bachelor\" outerspace edition. Kylo: \"Rey\, will you accept this rose?\" ?? There are better plot twists on message boards and YouTube. Would someone please explain to me like I'm a 6 yr old\, what was the point of Snoke? He's telepathic\, can see Kylo's thoughts\, but isn't clairvoyant enough to see that he's about to be cut in half? In a word\, retarded! And what the fuck is it with this \"be a Jedi in three easy steps\" bullshit? It's harder to make a Chia pet it would seem. And Disney actually gave Rian Johnson the reins to create a new trilogy! Hollywood must be bereft of writing talent. It's not hard to see how JJ Abrams was the man who started this hot mess with episode seven because I am truly \"Lost\" at where the writing team is trying to take this franchise. You're making George Lucas's writing of the prequels seem Shakespearean by comparison. Disney has ruined all the original characters - ffs they even made poor Chewbacca a vegetarian! Oh and Luke dies from boredom/stress? Mark Hamill was right to be mad at the direction Disney (has anyone in the production team actually seen the movies?!?) took his character. It is time for the Jedi to end.
